entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:53 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
